EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Enroll for Direct Deposit & Provide System Data to Receive SREC Payments
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear *|MMERGE3|*,
Great news! Your Solar Renewable Energy Credit (SREC) payment is just around the corner.
Reminder! Because you have signed up for BlueWave's fixed monthly payment option for SRECs you must enroll in direct deposit in order to receive payment
Setting Up Direct Deposit:
Provide your deposit information here so we can have all of your SREC earnings deposited directly into your bank account. This is a program requirement for the SREC payment plan you have selected.
We'll be in touch again to let you know about your incoming SREC payment.
If you have any questions about SREC payments or your Home Solar Loan, contact us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com or (844) 786-4100.
